title: Triage with Threat Intelligence
description: A SOC analyst receives an EDR alert for a file with a specific hash. The analyst must use threat intelligence to triage it.

tasks.description: Extract the file hash from the EDR alert.
tasks.expected_outcome: Analyst has the key IOC from the alert.

tasks.description: Query a threat intelligence platform (like VirusTotal) with the file hash.
tasks.expected_outcome: Analyst successfully queries the external data source.

tasks.description: The platform confirms the hash belongs to a known ransomware variant used by a specific APT group. The analyst escalates the alert to the highest priority.
tasks.expected_outcome: Analyst uses threat intelligence to correctly assess the severity of the alert and escalate appropriately.
